AYAN-YUE GUPTA

Home Research Art C.V.

I am an early career researcher at the University of Bristol. My research interests cover computational social science, natural language processing, neoliberalism, governmentality, discourse analysis, pragmatics, philosophy of language and sociolinguistics.

Before starting my PhD I was a practising artist in London. A selection of my artworks can be found here. I also have stuff on my instagram and youtube pages.

E-mail: dm18378@bristol.ac.uk
